headline: Stanley Black & Decker Exhibits Strong Prospects Despite Headwinds
summary: SWK is set to benefit from its cost-reduction program and accretive acquisitions. However, weakness in both segments remains concerning.

raw.headline: Stanley Black & Decker Exhibits Strong Prospects Despite Headwinds

headline: Allegion: Not Locked In Here
summary: Allegion plc has benefited from strategic acquisitions, including Stanley Black & Decker's security assets. Read why I'm neutral on ALLE stock.

raw.headline: Allegion: Not Locked In Here
raw.summary: Allegion plc has benefited from strategic acquisitions, including Stanley Black & Decker's security assets. Read why I'm neutral on ALLE stock.

headline: Three Reasons Why SWK is Risky and One Stock to Buy Instead
summary: Stanley Black & Decker currently trades at $81.91 per share and has shown little upside over the past six months, posting a small loss of 2.9%. The stock also fell short of the S&P 500’s 10.6% gain during that period.
